name: Velvet Hand Wash Rose
description: Velvet allows its consumers to embrace their softness through its Hydrosoft technology which locks in moisture and delivers soft supple skin. Velvet places a lot of importance on consumer safety, therefore is the only beauty brand in Sri Lanka that is Dermatologically accredited for skin safety and non-irritancy on skin whilst also being free of paraben. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
